projects.title: Audiophile
projects.description: (In development) A frontend-mentor challenge. Ecommerce. State handled with React-query and Zustand. Styled with sass using mixins based on the figma sketch.

projects.title: Pokemon
projects.description: (Incomplete) Pokemon index. Search or browse pokemons and view details for each pokemon. Connected to the pokeapi API. State handled with React-query and styled with Tailwind

projects.title: Bmerketo CMS
projects.description: A CMS website for a fake company. You can add, edit, delete products and edit the status on placed orders. Backend built with Nodejs(Express) and connected to mongoDB, full CRUD. Routes are restricted unless logged in. Login handled with Nodejs

projects.title: Baked
projects.description: Ecommerce website. Add products to cart and proceed to checkout if logged in. Search and filter products. Data is stored using JSON-server and state handled with Redux-toolkit. Login/registration built with Firebase

projects.title: Movies
projects.description: Movie database connected to the OMDb API. Search and view details of movies/shows. State handled with Redux-toolkit and styled with Tailwind. You can login/register through Auth0. The API was very strict and only allowed searches, no filtering or categorizing was possible

projects.title: Blogs
projects.description: Create, edit or delete your posts. Bearer token authentication and storing token on client-side. Backend built with Nodejs(Express) and connected to mongoDB. Styled with Bootstrap. Login/registration handled with Nodejs

clones.title: Easybank
clones.description: A frontend-mentor challenge. A landing page for Easybank. Animations and mixins with sass and some javascript

clones.title: Newsletter sign-up form
clones.description: A frontend-mentor challenge. Responsive sign up form with email validation. Styled with Tailwind

clones.title: Google
clones.description: Simple Google clone styled with Bootstrap/react-bootstrap
